main.paragraph:
Find any quote
in millions of movie lines

interstellar.title: interstellar, 2004
interstellar.quote:
You have to leave something
behind to go forward

the_royal_tenenbaums.title: The Royal Tenenbaums, 2001
the_royal_tenenbaums.quote:
I think we are just gonna have
to be secretly in love with each other
and leave it that

the_lord_of_rings.title: The Lord of the Rings, 2003
the_lord_of_rings.quote:
I see in your eyes the same
fear that would take the heart of me...
